name: millefeuille
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
a dish of thin layers of pastry with a sweet or savoury (= not sweet) filling between each layer: For dessert, I had a lovely raspberry millefeuille. a mille-feuille of smoked salmon with fresh herbs
More examplesFewer examplesThe chocolate and hazelnut millefeuille with summer fruits is especially good. We had canapés, followed by smoked salmon and cream cheese millefeuilles.There are also savoury mille-feuilles, with cheese and spinach or other fillings. The lemon mille-feuille dessert was wonderful.
